pd.p: Call duration of the local user in seconds, represented by an aggregate value.

plentry.pd: The total number of audio bytes sent, represented by an aggregate value.
The total number of video bytes sent, represented by an aggregate value.
The total number of audio bytes received, represented by an aggregate value.
The total number of video bytes received, represented by an aggregate value.
The bitrate (Kbps) of receiving the audio.
The bitrate (Kbps) of sending the audio packet.
The bitrate (Kbps) of receiving the video.
The bitrate (Kbps) of sending the video.
The packet loss rate (%) from the client to the Agora server before using the anti-packet-loss method.
The packet loss rate (%) from the Agora server to the client before using the anti-packet-loss method.

pd.p:
The number of users in the channel.
For COMMUNICATION profile: The number of users in the channel.
For LIVE_BROADCASTING profile:
If the local user is an audience member: The number of users in the channel = The number of hosts in the channel + 1.
If the user is a host: The number of users in the channel = The number of hosts in the channel.

plentry.pd: The CPU usage (%) of the application.

pd.p: In the multi-kernel environment, this member represents the average CPU usage. The value = 100 - System Idle Progress in Task Manager.

plentry.pd: The round-trip time delay from the client to the local router.

pd.p: The memory occupied by the application (%).
pd.note: This value is for reference only. Due to system limitations, you may not get this value.

pd.p: The memory occupied by the system (%).
pd.note: This value is for reference only. Due to system limitations, you may not get this value.

pd.p: The memory occupied by the application (KB).
pd.note: This value is for reference only. Due to system limitations, you may not get this value.
